interestingFact: India is the largest democracy in the world and is known for its diverse culture and heritage.
The United States is home to the Grand Canyon, one of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World.
China is the world's most populous country and has the Great Wall, the longest wall in the world.
Japan has more than 6,800 islands, with its cuisine and technology being globally admired.
Germany is known for its engineering expertise and is home to the world-famous Oktoberfest.
Brazil is famous for its Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the world's largest coral reef system.
Canada has the longest coastline in the world, spanning over 202,080 kilometers.
South Africa is known as the 'Rainbow Nation' due to its diverse cultures.
France is the most visited country in the world, with Paris being a top tourist destination.
